title: NCLT approves Chemhub's resolution plan for Pancard Clubs
description: Chemhub Tradelink's plan for Pancard Clubs, approved by NCLT, involves Rs 8,900 crore debt claims with 8% recovery for creditors. The resolution process included bidders like Ashdan Properties and Vijay K. Oswal, with oversight from Deloitte and representation by Nausher Kohli.
